channel.title: "This battle [for reality] can’t be fought with facts alone"
channel.description:
From the Washington Post:
> [The disinformation system that Trump unleashed will outlast him. Here’s what reality-based journalists must do about it.](https://www.washingtonpost.com/lifestyle/media/trump-disinformation-journalism-next-steps/2020/11/20/6a634378-2ac8-11eb-92b7-6ef17b3fe3b4_story.html)
